bookCover.coverDescription: An interactive guide on "Parts of computer system" for grade - 2

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Like we humans have different parts like hands, legs, brain. Computer also has different parts.

Primary parts of computer are Monitor, CPU, Keyboard, Mouse.

Secondary parts of computer are Printer, Headphones, Speakers.
fig : Computer System

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
CPU stands for Central Processing Unit. 

It's features are:

  • It is the brain of the computer and it controls other parts of the computer.
  • CPU stores lot of informations for future use.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Monitor is an output device which displays information to the user.

It's features are:

  • Monitor looks just like a television.
  • It displays informations on the screen as an output.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

choices.question: What does CPU stand for?
answers:
Central Processing Unit

Control Processing Unit

Centripetal Processing Unit

metadata.title: Q4. Drag the words into the correct boxes

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Keyboard is an input device that has many buttons called keys. 

Some features of keyboard are:

  • You can input any letter or number using keyboard.
  • Keyboard has any types of keys like Function keys, alphabet keys, arrow keys, number keys.
Types of keys on keyboard

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
The function keys are from F1, F2, F3,......., F12.

The alphabet keys are from a to z.

The number keys are from 0 to 9.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Mouse is also a input device that has 2 or 3 buttons. You can click the buttons to give input to the computer.

Some features of mouse are:

  • If you click a mouse button once, it is called single click and if you click the button twice, it is called a double click.
  • Mouse is also called a pointing input device.
  • It also has a scroll button

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

choices.question: What is a keyboard?
answers:
Input device with many keys

Input device with 2 buttons

Output device

metadata.title: Q4. Drag the words into the correct boxes

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Those device that provides information to the user are called output devices.

Some output devices are speaker, printer, monitor, headphones.
fig : speaker

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Speaker is an audio producing output device. 

Some of it's features are:

  • The output generated by speaker is temporary, so speaker is called a softcopy output device.
  • Speaker generates sounds as an output.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text:
Printer is an output device that displays information on paper.

Some features of printer are:

  • Printer prints the same thing seen on monitor on a paper.
  • The output from a printer is permanent, so printer is called a hard copy output device.
  • Printer uses ink to print on the paper.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

choices.question: Why is a speaker called soft copy output device?
answers:
Output of speaker is temporary

Output of speaker is permanent

Speaker is not an output device
